attributes.action: Control of Profit by Utility Companies
attributes.additional_details:
Every year your bill gets higher, your utility provider makes even more profit.  At the same time your wage goes down and everything else becomes even more expensive.

The Government should hold a proper debate on these practices being carried out by the utility companies.

The every day man on the street cannot understand why he should pay more for his gas and electricity than he did last year, when the providers make more proift they they did last year.
